story-moment.DAMAGE CONTROL: Hired to remove debris in the wake of the Battle of New York, Adrian Toomes and his crew discover they’ve been replaced by the Department of Damage Control.
story-moment.ENCOUNTER WITH SPIDER-MAN: Toomes’ brief first encounter with Spider-Man includes Toomes flying the young hero far up into the sky.
story-moment.FACE OFF: Toomes and Spider-Man face off on the Staten Island Ferry, resulting in the boat being split in two.
story-moment.THREATENING PETER: Toomes warns Peter Parker that he knows he is Spider-Man, threatening the lives of those Peter loves in the process.
story-moment.EQUIPMENT MALFUNCTION: Spider-Man and Toomes battle on the beach at Coney Island, while Toomes’ equipment begins to malfunction due to damage.

powers+abilities.SKILLED THIEF: Adrien Toomes is a skilled thief, planning and executing daring robberies with the assistance of his crew.
powers+abilities.FLIGHT: The Vulture suit allows Toomes to fly via large mechanized wings.
powers+abilities.BIRD-LIKE TALONS: Toomes’ suit includes talons on the boots, allowing him to grasp loot and opponents alike.
powers+abilities.VULTURE SUIT: Vulture’s helmet and mask protects Toomes’ identity and provides him with oxygen while flying at high altitudes.
